work.name: Industrial and Commercial Bank of Vietnam
work.summary: Translated banking documents in English to Vietnamese. Acted as an interpreter when needed. Developed and maintained the correspondent banking relationship with Russian banks. Kept track of loans borrowed from foreign banks. Worked on the Returnee project between Vietnam and the German Reconstruction Bank. Did other administrative and clerical work.
